info.name: MDMS v2 Schema Creation
info.description:
- "tenant" collection variable is for the schema being added to database
    
- "userTenant" collection variable is for the auth token API, user specific tenant id to be added
- "i" variable will always be 0

header.value: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/108.0.0.0 Safari/537.36

response.name: Employee Auth Token

header.value: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/108.0.0.0 Safari/537.36
